trans-unit.source: A tooltip is a short description that is linked to another control or object.
trans-unit.target: A tooltip is a short description that is linked to another control or object.

trans-unit.source: Tooltips help users understand unfamiliar objects that aren't described directly in the UI.
trans-unit.target: Tooltips help users understand unfamiliar objects that aren't described directly in the UI.

trans-unit.source: They display automatically when the user presses and holds or hovers the mouse pointer over a control.
trans-unit.target: They display automatically when the user presses and holds or hovers the mouse pointer over a control.

trans-unit.source: The tooltip disappears when the user moves the finger, the mouse pointer, or a pen pointer.
trans-unit.target: The tooltip disappears when the user moves the finger, the mouse pointer, or a pen pointer.

trans-unit.source: When should you use a tooltip?
trans-unit.target: When should you use a tooltip?

trans-unit.source: To decide, consider these questions:
trans-unit.target: To decide, consider these questions:

trans-unit.source: Is the info displayed based on pointer hover?
trans-unit.target: Is the info displayed based on pointer hover?

trans-unit.source: If not, use another control.
trans-unit.target: If not, use another control.

trans-unit.source: Display tips only as the result of user interaction—never display them on their own.
trans-unit.target: Display tips only as the result of user interaction—never display them on their own.

trans-unit.source: Does a control have a text label?
trans-unit.target: Does a control have a text label?

trans-unit.source: If not, use a tooltip to provide the label.
trans-unit.target: If not, use a tooltip to provide the label.

trans-unit.source: It is a good programming practice to label most controls and for these you don't need tooltips.
trans-unit.target: It is a good programming practice to label most controls and for these you don't need tooltips.

trans-unit.source: Toolbar controls and command buttons with graphic labels need tooltips.
trans-unit.target: Toolbar controls and command buttons with graphic labels need tooltips.

trans-unit.source: Does an object benefit from a more detailed description or further info?
trans-unit.target: Does an object benefit from a more detailed description or further info?

trans-unit.source: If so, use a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: If so, use a tooltip.

trans-unit.source: But the text must be supplemental—that is, not essential to the primary tasks.
trans-unit.target: But the text must be supplemental—that is, not essential to the primary tasks.

trans-unit.source: If it is essential, put it directly in the UI so that users don't have to discover or hunt for it.
trans-unit.target: If it is essential, put it directly in the UI so that users don't have to discover or hunt for it.

trans-unit.source: Is the supplemental info an error, warning, or status?
trans-unit.target: Is the supplemental info an error, warning, or status?

trans-unit.source: If so, use another UI element, such as a flyout.
trans-unit.target: If so, use another UI element, such as a flyout.

trans-unit.source: Do users need to interact with the tip?
trans-unit.target: Do users need to interact with the tip?

trans-unit.source: If so, use another control.
trans-unit.target: If so, use another control.

trans-unit.source: Users can't interact with tips because moving the mouse makes them disappear.
trans-unit.target: Users can't interact with tips because moving the mouse makes them disappear.

trans-unit.source: Do users need to print the supplemental info?
trans-unit.target: Do users need to print the supplemental info?

trans-unit.source: If so, use another control.
trans-unit.target: If so, use another control.

trans-unit.source: Will users find the tips annoying or distracting?
trans-unit.target: Will users find the tips annoying or distracting?

trans-unit.source: If so, consider using another solution—including doing nothing at all.
trans-unit.target: If so, consider using another solution—including doing nothing at all.

trans-unit.source: If you do use tips where they might be distracting, allow users to turn them off.
trans-unit.target: If you do use tips where they might be distracting, allow users to turn them off.

trans-unit.source: One example of a good way to use tooltips is to show a preview of the linked website when users touch a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: One example of a good way to use tooltips is to show a preview of the linked website when users touch a hyperlink.

trans-unit.source: Recommendations
trans-unit.target: Recommendations

trans-unit.source: Use tooltips sparingly (or not at all).
trans-unit.target: Use tooltips sparingly (or not at all).

trans-unit.source: Tooltips are an interruption.
trans-unit.target: Tooltips are an interruption.

trans-unit.source: A tooltip can be as distracting as a pop-up, so don't use them unless they add significant value.
trans-unit.target: A tooltip can be as distracting as a pop-up, so don't use them unless they add significant value.

trans-unit.source: Keep the tooltip text concise.
trans-unit.target: Keep the tooltip text concise.

trans-unit.source: Tooltips are perfect for short sentences and sentence fragments.
trans-unit.target: Tooltips are perfect for short sentences and sentence fragments.

trans-unit.source: Large blocks of text are difficult to read and overwhelming.
trans-unit.target: Large blocks of text are difficult to read and overwhelming.

trans-unit.source: Create helpful, supplemental tooltip text.
trans-unit.target: Create helpful, supplemental tooltip text.

trans-unit.source: Tooltip text must be informative.
trans-unit.target: Tooltip text must be informative.

trans-unit.source: Don't make it obvious or just repeat what is already on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Don't make it obvious or just repeat what is already on the screen.

trans-unit.source: Because tooltip text isn't always visible, it should be supplemental info that users don't have to read.
trans-unit.target: Because tooltip text isn't always visible, it should be supplemental info that users don't have to read.

trans-unit.source: Communicate important info using self-explanatory control labels or in-place supplemental text.
trans-unit.target: Communicate important info using self-explanatory control labels or in-place supplemental text.

trans-unit.source: Use images when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Use images when appropriate.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's better to use an image in a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes it's better to use an image in a tooltip.

trans-unit.source: For example, when the user touches a hyperlink, you can use a tooltip to show a preview of the linked page.
trans-unit.target: For example, when the user touches a hyperlink, you can use a tooltip to show a preview of the linked page.

trans-unit.source: Don't use a tooltip to display text already visible in the UI.
trans-unit.target: Don't use a tooltip to display text already visible in the UI.

trans-unit.source: For example, don't put a tooltip on a button that shows the same text of the button unless touching the button blocks its text.
trans-unit.target: For example, don't put a tooltip on a button that shows the same text of the button unless touching the button blocks its text.

trans-unit.source: Don't put interactive controls inside the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Don't put interactive controls inside the tooltip.

trans-unit.source: Don't put images that look like they are interactive inside the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Don't put images that look like they are interactive inside the tooltip.

trans-unit.source: Tooltips should be used sparingly, and only when they are adding distinct value for the user who is trying to complete a task.
trans-unit.target: Tooltips should be used sparingly, and only when they are adding distinct value for the user who is trying to complete a task.

trans-unit.source: One rule of thumb is that if the information is available elsewhere in the same experience, you do not need a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: One rule of thumb is that if the information is available elsewhere in the same experience, you do not need a tooltip.

trans-unit.source: A valuable tooltip will clarify an unclear action.
trans-unit.target: A valuable tooltip will clarify an unclear action.
